tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    plan_id INTEGER REFERENCES SavingsPlans(plan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SavingsPlans (
  plan_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  plan_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  plan_description TEXT,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PlanDetails (
  detail_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_id INT REFERENCES SavingsPlans(plan_id),
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  duration INT NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Savings_Plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(255),
    plan_description TEXT,
    plan_type ENUM('Fixed', 'Flexible', 'Custom'),
    monthly_contribution DECIMAL(10, 2),
    maturity_period INT
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
    investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    plan_id INT,
    amount_invested DECIMAL(10, 2),
    investment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id INT,
    transaction_type ENUM('Deposit', 'Withdrawal'),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Savings_Plans (
  plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_name TEXT,
  plan_description TEXT,
  interest_rate DECIMAL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name TEXT,
  customer_email TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT,
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  account_type TEXT,
  balance DECIMAL,
  open_date DATE,
  customer_id UUID REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_type TEXT,
  account_id UUID REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Plans_Status (
  status_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_id UUID REFERENCES Savings_Plans(plan_id),
  account_id UUID REFERENCES Accounts(account_id),
  enrollment_date DATE,
  status TEXT
);
